title: O happy day! that bursts the tomb

verses.text: O happy day! that bursts the tomb, And sets the joyful pris'ners free; That lifts the saints from death and gloom, To light and immortality.
O happy day! when Jesus comes, The righteous foes shall bloom again; The desert closes shall surrender, Nor death e'er fread their wide domain.
O happy day! when far around, Through all this universal frame, One glorious anthem shall resound, Of blessing to Jehovah's name.
O happy day! that knows no night; Nor sorrow with thy joy shall blend; No clouds shall mar its sacred light, Thy scenes of glory ne'er shall end.

chorus.text: Happy day! happy day! For thee we'll watch and pray; We bid thy hours no more delay; Oh! chase the shadows all away, Happy day! happy day! For thee we'll watch and pray.
